task.title: Blueberry Waffles
task.shortdesc: A recipe for Mom's homemade blueberry waffles. You'll need a mixing bowl, whisk, waffle maker and measuring cups/spoons.

taskbody.context:
Ingredients you will need
2 cups flour
2 tablespoons sugar
1 tablespoon baking powder
1 teaspoon salt
1 Â¾ cups milk
1/3 cup vegetable oil
2 eggs
Blueberries

substep.cmd: Combine the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt into your mixing bowl.
Whisk the milk, vegetable oil and eggs together.
Gradually pour the milk mixture into the dry mixture.
Pour the batter into your waffle maker.
Cook according to instructions on your waffle maker, usually 4-6 minutes on medium high or until the waffle maker stops steaming.
substep.stepresult: Yummy Blueberry Waffles, just like Mom makes them!
